format: YAML-like configuration file for build system (likely BitBake or similar)
description: This file specifies build metadata and source configuration for the systemtap package within a Yocto or similar build environment. It includes source URI, checksum, versioned variables, and build instructions.

methods.name: python
methods.description: A Python function enforcing build constraints against optimization levels. It terminates the build if optimization is set to -O0.
